long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your writing with Correcto: Spellcheck and much more.

Take your writing ‚úçüèΩ to the next level with the Correcto extension for Chrome, a specialized Spanish spell checker designed to help you write with clarity, consistency, and style on the web. Whether you're composing emails or sending personal messages, Correcto offers real-time assistance to ensure your words make the impact you want.

- Key features.
üìÑ Spelling and grammar checker: Detects and corrects grammar, spelling, and punctuation errors that other checkers may miss.

üåü AI text paraphraser: Rewrite sentences to improve coherence, clarity, and tone, helping you communicate effectively.

üó£Ô∏è Tone and Style: Understand your writing style and tone to ensure it's appropriate for the person you're writing to.

üìö Writing tools for students: With the paraphrasing tool your academic texts won't have plagiarism problems. Paraphrase your papers with Correcto, give credit in the writing and you're done.

üèÖ All in Spanish: Correcto is the spelling and grammar checker specialized 100% in Spanish. Unlike other competitors that offer dozens of languages without specializing in any of them, we will make your Spanish the best of them all.

-How it works
Correcto is a spell checker that analyzes your texts as you write. As it detects mistakes, it underlines these words so that you can correct them in a single click. It also marks whole sentences so that you can paraphrase them according to your intention in the message.

Correcto will help you improve your writing instantly. Don't let your texts be full of spelling and grammatical errors and boost your educational and professional life with our tool.

- Write with confidence on any platform
Take your emails and personal messages to the next level :parte_superior: with Correcto. Our tool is available on Gmail and WhatsApp, although we will be on many more websites soon. Our extension will make your personal and professional written communication never be the same again.

- Why choose Correcto
Thousands of people have downloaded Correcto to improve their writing, whether they're composing professional emails or sending personal messages. Our spell checker and paraphraser not only correct errors but also help you find the best words and expressions to make your message clear, compelling, and accurate.

- Premium Features
Access unlimited paraphrasing or rewriting suggestions. With Correcto's premium plan, make your writing shine independently without worrying about everything sounding the same.

- Security and privacy
We value your privacy. Your text is processed securely over an encrypted connection, and we do not store your personal information. For more details, see our privacy policy.

Discover what you can achieve with Correcto, your perfect writing partner.
